name: Death Will Find A Way!
description:
An old man trying to escape for death but weather we fight or not death is inevitable.

Made For Ludum Game Jam50 , and now Updated verson 1.0

Controls

"A" left

"D" Right

"Space" Jump Hold For Max Jump

Burgers Slow You Down

Salad Slows Death Down

Soda Makes You Run Faster

Also Supports Controller Fully
